name: Emspoma Universal Massage Emulsion 1000 ml
descr:
Designed for universal use, for all types of long-term and short-term massage as well as self-massage. It evokes feelings of refreshment and lightness. It is also designed for finishing all types and sorts of massages.
 
Dermatologicaly tested. Effect on the skin: Neutral pH-value.
 
Also available in 200 ml and 500 ml version.
